artist: Utagawa Kunisada Published by Minatoya Kohei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of man wearing bright red wig or headdress, tied with red cord under his chin; man wears garments with various patterns including white, blue and brown plaid, red, pink, blue and yellow squares, and fabric with gold dragons on black ground; landscape in background with trees and building at left; red cartouche with text, yellow flower and black lantern with yellow circles in URC
marks: Signature and Seal in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Makinohara at Mochizuki and Ōtaka Shuden
